column1: Smoque BBQ////Little story. I went to Nashville for work and flew to Nashville Airport. On the way back home
column2: I almost got a ticket cuz I was almost late
column4: once I got checked in 'n' all
column5: I had plenty of time! So
column7: I stopped by this random bar that served food (remember
column8: this is in an AIRPORT). I had their pulled pork
column9: and while their BBQ sauce was about on par with Smoque
column10: the pulled pork itself was DELICIOUS! But this is not a review about Airport Bar Food
